{"settings":"{ "editor.linkedEditing": true, "terminal.integrated.profiles.windows": { "PowerShell": { "source": "PowerShell", "icon": "terminal-powershell" }, "Command Prompt": { "path": [ "${env:windir}\\Sysnative\\cmd.exe", "${env:windir}\\System32\\cmd.exe" ], "args": [], "icon": "terminal-cmd" }, "Git Bash": { "source": "Git Bash" }, "Windows PowerShell": { "path": "C:\\WINDOWS\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe" }, "PowerShell2": { "path": "C:\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\7\\pwsh.exe" } }, "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.windows": "Windows PowerShell", "powershell.cwd": "%homepath% \\source\\github.com\\mypstools", "powershell.integratedConsole.suppressStartupBanner": true, "powershell.powerShellAdditionalExePaths": { "windows-psw": "C:\\WINDOWS\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe", "ps7": "C:\\Users\\alans\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\WindowsApps\\Microsoft.PowerShell_8wekyb3d8bbwe\\pwsh.exe" }, "powershell.powerShellDefaultVersion": "PowerShell (x64)", "oneDarkPro.bold": true, "git.openRepositoryInParentFolders": "always", "editor.minimap.enabled": false, "window.menuBarVisibility": "compact", "editor.fontFamily": "'Intel One Mono','Cascadia Code',Consolas, 'Courier New', monospace", "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "'Cascadia Mono'", "git.autofetch": true, "git.autorefresh": false, "git.enableSmartCommit": true, "vsicons.presets.hideExplorerArrows": true, "remote.SSH.remotePlatform": { "dsbim902": "linux", "192.168.0.13": "linux" }, "git.confirmSync": false, "workbench.preferredDarkColorTheme": "Atom One Dark", "todo-tree.highlights.enabled": false, "todo-tree.tree.buttons.viewStyle": false, "window.commandCenter": false, "todo-tree.tree.labelFormat": " ${after}", "gitdoc.filePattern": "**/*.md", "git.postCommitCommand": "push", "gitdoc.enabled": true, "editor.minimap.scale": 2, "markdown-pdf.headerTemplate": "
", "vsicons.dontShowNewVersionMessage": true, "vsicons.presets.foldersAllDefaultIcon": true, "diffEditor.ignoreTrimWhitespace": false, "powershell.suppressAdditionalExeNotFoundWarning": true, "workbench.settings.applyToAllProfiles": [ "powershell.enableProfileLoading" ], "http.proxyAuthorization": null, "workbench.colorCustomizations": { "[Atom One Dark Pro Darker]": { "terminal.background": "#000000", "editor.background": "#0b0c0d" } }, "editor.tokenColorCustomizations":{ "comments": "#838383", }, "markdown-preview-enhanced.previewTheme": "atom-dark.css", "markdown-preview-enhanced.automaticallyShowPreviewOfMarkdownBeingEdited": true, "a-file-icon-vscode.showWelcomeMessage": false, "a-file-icon-vscode.arrowTheme": "none", "powershell.startAsLoginShell.osx": false, "powershell.codeFormatting.autoCorrectAliases": true, "workbench.startupEditor": "newUntitledFile", "powershell.promptToUpdatePowerShell": false, "security.workspace.trust.startupPrompt": "always", "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open", "editor.rulers": [ 120 ], "window.dialogStyle": "custom", "dayNightThemeSwitcher.nightTheme": "Dark Modern", "dayNightThemeSwitcher.dayTheme": "Light Modern", "redhat.telemetry.enabled": true, "window.customTitleBarVisibility": "auto", "window.titleBarStyle": "custom", "workbench.iconTheme": "material-icon-theme" }"}
